en_notes:
• Supports brotli encode/decode.
 • Supports regular history deletion.
 • Fixed a bug where the regular injection would cause the target no response.
 • Fixed a bug where the order of regulars were not correct.
 • Fixed a bug where the option of system certificate installation is invisible.
zh_notes:
• [新增] 新增规则历史记录删除功能。
 • [新增] 新增支持Brotli编解码。
 • [修复] 修复规则匹配注入导致目标应用收不到响应的bug。
 • [修复] 修复规则匹配注入编辑页列表顺序颠倒的bug。
 • [修复] 修复root机器不显示安装系统证书的bug。
